synopsis.text: She may be new to the gaming world, but Kaede Honjou is no stranger to strategy. When her friend, Risa Shiramine, invites her to join the popular VRMMO game, "New World Online," Kaede takes a unique approach to character creation. Determined to avoid any pain, she pours all her stat points into defense, creating a character named Maple. Though this decision leaves Maple with limited mobility and no magical abilities, it also grants her an unbeatable skill set. With "Absolute Defense" and a powerful counterattack, Maple becomes an unstoppable force, capable of taking down enemies with a single hit. As she navigates the thrilling world of "New World Online," Maple's extraordinary abilities and resilience earn her a reputation as a formidable player. But even with her impressive skills, Maple has much to learn about the game and the friends she'll meet along the way.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
